meanings.sent1: My girlfriends and I love going shopping together.
meanings.sent2: She has a few close girlfriends she can always count on.
meanings.sent3: My girlfriends and I always end up laughing so much when we're together.
meanings.sent4: Her girlfriends are like the stars in her sky, always shining bright.
meanings.sent5: The bond between girlfriends is unbreakable and full of love.

meanings.definition: A woman's female friend with whom she has a romantic or sexual relationship.
meanings.sent1: She introduced her new girlfriend to us last night.
meanings.sent2: They have been girlfriends for over a year now.
meanings.sent3: Her girlfriend surprised her with a romantic picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: Their love story is like a fairytale, two girlfriends against all odds.
meanings.sent5: The connection between girlfriends in a relationship is special and unique.
